afternoon.title: Women in Streaming Media Networking
afternoon.description: GOSIM is an inclusive gathering designed to provide a welcoming space for open-source AI projects, both large and small, to share knowledge, learn from each other, and collaborate. It serves as a hub where developers, researchers, enthusiasts, and industry sponsors can come together to exchange ideas, refine their work, and form meaningful connections.
